name: Coding-Quizzer-BackendAsService
description: The Coding Quiz Generator is a web application that dynamically generates coding-related quizzes, allowing users to test their knowledge and skills. Used Google Firebase for Backend as a service

name: Ecommerce_Website-Angular-Spring
description: Modern E-commerce Platform: Experience seamless online shopping with our e-commerce website developed using the Spring framework for robust back-end functionality and Angular for a dynamic and responsive user interface.

name: React-Journey
description: Embark on your React Journey! Explore hands-on projects, master key concepts, and build a solid foundation in React development with this interactive showcase on GitHub.

name: JavaScript Project Collection
description: Explore JavaScript Day by Day: This repository serves as my learning journey through JavaScript. Each day, I tackle different JavaScript projects, documenting my progress and sharing code examples.

name: ClassRoom Management
description: The application has three user roles: admin, teacher, and student. As an admin, I created a feature-rich admin panel with seven modules, allowing for easy management of student and teacher information. CRUD operations

name: Generate-RandomUser-API
description: RandomUserGenerator is a web application that utilizes a random user data API to generate and display detailed user profiles

name: Github-Contribution-Graph-API
description: This web application allows users to search for GitHub users and view comprehensive information about their GitHub profiles. The main feature is a visually appealing contribution calendar that displays the user's daily contribution activity.

name: Project-Portfolio-Website
description: This web application allows users to search for GitHub users and view comprehensive information about their GitHub profiles. The main feature is a visually appealing contribution calendar that displays the user's daily contribution activity.
